title: 29: Nothing Worse Than A Hot Girl - ft. Nikki Glaser
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: This episode may contain sensitive subjects to some listeners. 
Surprise! Sofia’s moving to Miami AND she’s going to be a Real Housewife!
This week the Queen Sloot is joined by superstar comedian, Nikki Glaser. While these two may be the funniest women on earth, this episode actually gets PRETTY deep. Together the ladies discuss self-esteem, the scientific differences between the male and female orgasm (IF he can even give you one, right?), and the clusterf*ck world that is dating. Sofia also gives us some personal life updates including her upcoming move to Miami and her soon-to-be Real Housewives of Salt Lake City casting. As usual, her life is all over the place but hey - it’s her world, we’re just Sloots living in it. 
Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 
Episode promo codes:
Noom: http://www.noom.com/SOFIA
Roman: http://www.Getroman.com/SOFIA
Calm: http://www.calm.com/SOFIA
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
